name: Incredible Mimic Story
description:
Created in 5 days for Godot Wild Jam #53

  • Different enemies!
  • You can throw weapons!
  • And also grow tentacles!

---

Control and features:

LMB — attack, devouring the enemy
RMB — weapon throw

Devouring an enemy is a chance to get an eye (overview) and tentacles (speed - Shift)
